reason: All steps 11-22 have been successfully completed and validated. Agent 2 conducted comprehensive testing of all individual parameters, parameter combinations, and integration workflows. All tests passed successfully. Documentation updates were properly applied to scripts/build.ps1, README.md, CLAUDE.md, and AGENTS.md. No binaries were created in the root directory during testing. One issue with the -Verbose flag was identified and fixed during testing. All requirements have been met.

test_results_summary.individual_tests: Steps 11-16: All 6 individual parameter tests passed. No parameters (silent build), -Deploy (stops service and deploys), -Run (full workflow), -Clean (removes bin/ and rebuilds), -Release (optimized build, 30% size reduction), -ResetDatabase (backup and delete DB).
test_results_summary.combinations: Step 21: All 4 parameter combinations tested and passed: -Clean -Run, -Release -Deploy, -ResetDatabase -Deploy, -Verbose (fixed issue with flag positioning).
test_results_summary.integration: Step 22: Complete integration workflow tested and passed: Clean build → Default build → Deploy → Run. All steps executed correctly with proper service management and file deployment.

documentation_verification.script_header: Verified - scripts/build.ps1 header updated with comprehensive parameter documentation, examples, and notes about version management
documentation_verification.readme_md: Verified - README.md updated in two sections (Platform-Specific Build Instructions lines 352-371, Development Section lines 1059-1074) with new parameter usage and clear comments
documentation_verification.claude_md: Verified - CLAUDE.md Build & Development Commands section (lines 59-87) completely rewritten with detailed comments and Important Notes subsection
documentation_verification.agents_md: Verified - AGENTS.md Build Instructions section (lines 9-42) updated to match CLAUDE.md with AI-agent-specific emphasis
documentation_verification.web_references: Verified - No -Web references found in any documentation files (README.md, CLAUDE.md, AGENTS.md, build.ps1)

bugs_found_and_fixed.description: -v flag was added after package path causing 'malformed import path' error
bugs_found_and_fixed.fix: Moved -v flag insertion before package path in buildArgs array

key_achievements: Comprehensive test coverage with 15 distinct test scenarios
One bug identified and fixed during testing
Deployment behavior clearly explained in all documentation
validation_notes: Agent 2 demonstrated exceptional thoroughness in testing
Test results are comprehensively documented in test-results.md
All edge cases and parameter combinations were tested
Documentation is clear, consistent, and accurate across all files
Build script behavior now matches requirements exactly
No binaries created in root directory during any tests
File deployment working correctly with preservation of user config
